name: Bonnie and Clyde
cast: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt
description: Bonnie and Clyde is a 1967 American biographical crime film directed by Arthur Penn and starring Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway as the title characters Clyde Barrow and Bonnie Parker. The film also features Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman, and Estelle Parsons.

name: Reservoir Dogs
cast: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Chris Penn, SteveBuscemi, Lawrence Tierney, Michael Madsen
description: DescriptionSix criminals, hired to steal diamonds, do not know each other's true identity. While attempting the heist, the police ambushes them, leading them to believe that one of them is an undercover officer.

name: Doctor Zhivago
cast: Omar Sharif, Julie Christie
description: Covers behind-the-scenes shots during the making of David Lean's 'Doctor Zhivago' (1965), which is based on the novel, 'Doctor Zhivago' written by Boris Pasternak.

name: Rocky
cast: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Burgess Meredith, Carl Weathers
description: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a chance to fight heavyweight champion Apollo Creed. In a bid to earn respect and glory, Rocky jumps into the ring, unaware of the tough task ahead of him.

name: Braveheart
cast: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan
description: William Wallace, a Scottish rebel, along with his clan, sets out to battle King Edward I of England, who killed his bride a day after their marriage.

name: Seven
cast: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt
description: DescriptionA serial killer begins murdering people according to the seven deadly sins. Two detectives, one new to the city and the other about to retire, are tasked with apprehending the criminal.

name: Godfather
cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire
description: DescriptionDon Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to handover his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

name: The Wizard of Oz
cast: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr, Jack Haley
description: When a tornado rips through Kansas, Dorothy (Judy Garland) and her dog, Toto, are whisked away in their house to the magical land of Oz. They follow the Yellow Brick Road toward the Emerald City to meet the Wizard, and en route they meet a Scarecrow (Ray Bolger) that needs a brain, a Tin Man

name: The Shawshank Redemption
cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman
description: Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank prison. He becomes the most unconventional prisoner.

name: Back to the Future
cast: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
description: Marty travels back in time using an eccentric scientist's time machine. However, he must make his high-school-aged parents fall in love in order to return to the present.

name: Blade Runner
cast: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
description: Rick Deckard, an ex-policeman, becomes a special agent with a mission to exterminate a group of violent androids. As he starts getting deeper into his mission, he questions his own identity.

name: The Shining
cast: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall
description: Jack and his family move into an isolated hotel with a violent past. Living in isolation, Jack begins to lose his sanity, which affects his family members.

name: Fight Club
cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
description: Discontented with his capitalistic lifestyle, a white-collared insomniac forms an underground fight club with Tyler, a careless soap salesman. The project soon spirals down into something sinister.

name: Toy Story
cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen
description: Toy Story is a Disney media franchise that commenced in 1995 with the release of the animated feature film of the same name, produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

name: The Matrix
cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
description: Thomas Anderson, a computer programmer, is led to fight an underground war against powerful computers who have constructed his entire reality with a system called the Matrix.

name: Titanic
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet
description: Seventeen-year-old Rose hails from an aristocratic family and is set to be married. When she boards the Titanic, she meets Jack Dawson, an artist, and falls in love with him.

name: Jurassic Park
cast: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
description: John Hammond, an entrepreneur, opens a wildlife park containing cloned dinosaurs. However, a breakdown of the island's security system causes the creatures to escape and bring about chaos.

name: Wall-E
cast: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin
description: DescriptionA machine responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

name: The Dark Knight
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger
description: After Gordon, Dent and Batman begin an assault on Gotham's organised crime, the mobs hire the Joker, a psychopathic criminal mastermind who wants to bring all the heroes down to his level.

name: The Lion King
cast: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
description: Simba, a young lion prince, flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, Mufasa. Years later, a chance encounter with Nala, a lioness, causes him to return and take back what is rightfully his.

name: Glass
cast: James McAvoy, Bruce Willis, Samuel L. Jackson, Anya Taylor-Joy
description: David Dunn tries to stay one step ahead of the law while delivering vigilante justice on the streets of Philadelphia. His special talents soon put him on a collision course with the Beast -- the psychotic madman who has superhuman strength and 23 distinct personalities.

name: Happy Death Day 2U
cast: Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard, Phi Vu, Suraj Sharma
description: Tree is stuck in a time loop where she keeps reliving her last day over and over again. When it starts happening to her friends as well, she decides to put an end to it.

name: Captain Marvel
cast: Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Jude Law
description: Amidst a mission, Vers, a Kree warrior, gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. However, her life takes an unusual turn after she teams up with Fury, a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent.

name: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
cast: Ryan Reynolds, Justice Smith, Kathryn Newton, Bill Nighy
description: After the demise of his father, Tim travels to Ryme city where he runs into his father's Pokemon partner, Pikachu. They team up and try to work on the case left unfinished by Tim's father.

name: Aladdin
cast: Guy Ritchie, Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Marwan Kenzari
description: Aladdin is a lovable street urchin who meets Princess Jasmine, the beautiful daughter of the sultan of Agrabah. While visiting her exotic palace, Aladdin stumbles upon a magic oil lamp that unleashes a powerful, wisecracking, larger-than-life genie. As Aladdin and the genie start to become friends
